title: PeiPasi Naanga Busy Lyrics PeiPasi Tamil Movie
stanzas:
PeiPasi
PeiPasi Naanga busy
Naanga busy (2)
busy busy busy
busy busy!!!

peipasi ethu rusi
nadunisi
naanga busy.
busyyyy
busy busy busyyy.. (2)

odukaala kaalam kadikka
idhaya thaalam vegam pudikka
pudikka pudikka pudikka ah..

aachariyam achcham tharudhu
pathcha thaapam katchi maarudhu
padhattam virattum
dhisaiyil oadi,
ettu thikkum
sevuthula modhi

peipasi, ethu rusi
nadunisi
naanga busy.
busyyyy
busy busy busyyy.. (2)

theriyaati thoda nadunguthu
puriyaati pudhir kelambuthu
pudhirukku padhil vesam
poata kadhaiyum
kadharaviduthu

loopula pota paattaa
otta bayam manasu suththa
odum bayatha oram thalla
manasa suththi paakka solla
suthi suthi paaka paaka
getup maathi achcham thaakka
ippa sollu manusanukku
yaar edhiri.

peipasi, edhu rusi
nadunisi
naanga busy.
busyyyy
busy busy busyyy.. (2)
